# shadow-poll

Get perfect shadows

# Installation

`npm i shadow-poll --save`

Then...

```
import { shadowpoll } from 'shadowpoll';

shadowpoll({
    shadow-type: 'soft',
    padding: false
})
```

## options

shadowpoll supports 2 options, both of which are optional:

* *shadow_type* - _hard | soft_ (Default to soft)
* *padding* - _boolean_ (Default to false)
